html.value:
Dear {{firstName}} {{lastName}},

This is a reminder about your offer of admission to the 2022 LEAD GSLI.

Your Payment 2 is still OUTSTANDING for {{programName}} and should be completed as soon as possible. Final Deadline is {{payment2Deadline}}

We are assuming you are no longer interested in attending the 2022 LEAD program since we did not receive the required deposit by (         ), 2022 at 11:59pm PST nor did we receive notification that you were declining your appointment to your assigned LEAD Summer Business Institute.  Please let us know if you are still interested in attending the program before we have to relinquish you seat by (       ). 

Thank you for your interest in attending the LEAD Summer Business. 

Kindest regards,

You may contact the LEAD National Office at info@leadprogram.org 

Please make sure your balance is paid in full by the applicable payment deadline to avoid enrollment cancellations. You still need to complete your payment, please visit your Student Dashboard.

 

 

Sent on behalf of the LEAD Review Team
